ai_analysis.summary: No fraud indicators detected. All available fields are consistent, and the ML model assigns a negligible fraud risk.

ML ensemble scores are low (Random Forest 25.1%, XGBoost 27.0%, overall 0.0% fraud risk).
Issuer (MoneyGram) and serial format appear valid; no evidence of counterfeit.
Numeric amount (USD 450.00) aligns with typical transaction patterns; no written-numeric mismatch flagged.
Signature field is present and no issues reported.
No raw OCR text was supplied to indicate any spelling or alteration errors.
Training data shows 45% of fraud involves amount mismatches; none observed here.
actionable_recommendations: Verify customer ID at payout to ensure identity alignment.
Retain a copy of the signed money order for audit purposes.
Continue routine monitoring of this customer’s transactions for emerging patterns.
